info.title: Instructure Canvas Quiz Submissions API
info.description: Canvas LMS includes a REST API for accessing and modifying data externally from the main application, in your own programs and scripts.

parameters.name: include[]
parameters.description: Associations to include with the quiz submission question.nn        n        n          Allowed values: quiz_question

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description: The attempt number of the quiz submission being taken. Note that this mustnbe the latest attempt index, as questions for earlier attempts can not benmodified.

parameters.name: quiz_questions[]
parameters.description: Set of question IDs and the answer value.nnSee Appendix: Question Answer Formats for the accepted answer formats forneach question type.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description: The unique validation token you received when the Quiz Submission wasncreated.
